item.title: Set up a VHD for finance and operations apps
item.author: luan52@outlook.com (Hi there, this is Max Nguyen)
item.description: Complete guide for setting up and configuring OneBox VHD virtual machines for Dynamics 365 Finance and Operations development environments.
